author.persName: Afdal al-Din Qashani (known as Baba Afdal).

msItem.title: A collection of works of Baba Afdal Qashani.
msItem.note: Though the author appears not to be named except in the last and the titles are later additions the works are all those taken to be by, or associated with, Baba Afdal. ) 'Ard-namah. b) Translation of Aristotle's De Anima. c) Jawidan-namah. d) Translation of the pseudo-Aristotelian De Pomo. e) Risalah-i Saz u Pirayah. f) Risalah-i Madarij al-Kamal. g) Insha'-namah. e) Letters, the first apparently that to Taj al-Din Nushabadi, the second to Shams al-Din.
msItem.incipit: Khudawanda bi-fuzuni-yi furugh wa jud u jawdat

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
